name: QQ邮件推送
request_desc:
前往https://yunzhiapi.cn/
登录获取用户密钥token
request_example: https://yunzhiapi.cn/API/qqyx/index.php?send=发件人QQ邮箱&pass=发件邮件授权码&receive=收件人QQ邮箱&mtie=邮件标题&title=内容标题&content=邮箱内容

sdk.Python:
import requests

def send_qq_email(token, send, pass_, receive, mtie, title, content):
    """
    发送QQ邮件的函数

    :param token: 登录获取用户密钥
    :param send: 发件人QQ邮箱
    :param pass_: 发件邮箱的授权码
    :param receive: 收件人QQ邮箱
    :param mtie: 邮件标题【大标题】
    :param title: 内容标题【右侧小标题】
    :param content: 发件内容
    """
    # 请求URL
    url = "https://yunzhiapi.cn/API/qqyx/index.php"
    
    # 必填参数
    params = {
        "token": token,
        "send": send,
        "pass": pass_,
        "receive": receive,
        "mtie": mtie,
        "title": title,
        "content": content
    }
    
    # 可选参数，根据需要取消注释并赋值
    # params["param_name"] = "param_value"
    
    try:
        # 发送请求
        response = requests.get(url, params=params)
        response.raise_for_status()  # 如果响应状态码不是200，抛出异常
        
        # 返回响应内容
        return response.text
    
    except requests.exceptions.HTTPError as http_err:
        print(f"HTTP错误发生: {http_err}")  # HTTP错误
    except requests.exceptions.ConnectionError as conn_err:
        print(f"连接错误发生: {conn_err}")  # 连接错误
    except requests.exceptions.Timeout as timeout_err:
        print(f"请求超时: {timeout_err}")  # 超时错误
    except requests.exceptions.RequestException as req_err:
        print(f"请求错误: {req_err}")  # 其他请求错误

# 示例调用
# result = send_qq_email("your_token", "your_send_email", "your_auth_code", "your_receive_email", "大标题", "右侧小标题", "邮件内容")
